title: (07550) Son Servera - 3 Carrer de Cabrera
description:
Parking where you can park your motor home without problem, in front of an Eroski Supermarket and a Muller store.
Very quiet street, from where you can reach the town center in just 8 min. walking.

title: (07550) Son Servera - 76 Carrer del Doctor Servera
title_short: (07550) Son Servera - 76 Carrer del Doctor Servera
description: On a gravel parking, but if you go at the end of it, you will feel like wilderness! No service, no height limit, supermarket nearby, we spent two quiet nights without passing cars, a few pedestrians in the morning. Start of a hiking trail, breathtaking panoramic view!

title: (07550) Manacor - 1 Calle Vial 9 Ur Ca. Sh
title_short: (07550) Manacor - 1 Calle Vial 9 Ur Ca. Sh

title: (07550) Son Servera - 1 Calle Vial 12 U Ca. Sh
title_short: (07550) Son Servera - 1 Calle Vial 12 U Ca. Sh
description: Repsol service station, you have services to evacuate gray and black water, and water filling.

title: (07560) Cala Bona - 999 Calle Davant Short Cm
title_short: (07560) Cala Bona - 999 Calle Davant Short Cm
description: Public parking in Cala Millor with Pinos. It is next to a school.

title: (07559) Son Servera - 33B Carretera Cala Bona-Cp
description: Great place without restrictions. Near the center and beach. Quiet at night. At 7 o'clock in the morning, activities are heard on the street.

title: (07560) Son Servera - 41 Carrer de Davant s'Hort
title_short: (07560) Son Servera - 41 Carrer de Davant s'Hort

title: (07559) Son Servera - 30B Camí de sa Punta
title_short: (07559) Son Servera - 30B Camí de sa Punta
description: Ample parking next to the sea near a restaurant, at the end of the street, next to the promenade and bike path.

title: (07570) Artà - 2 Carretera son Servera
description: You can not only exchange (Spanish) gas bottles here, but also buy large Spanish gas bottles (11kg).  The people were super friendly and helpful too.

title: (07560) Sant Llorenç des Cardassar - 46 Avinguda del Bon Temps
title_short: (07560) Sant Llorenç des Cardassar - 46 Avinguda del Bon Temps

title: (07560) Sant Antoni de Portmany - 18 Paseo Mar

title: (07559) Son Servera - 80 Passeig Pintor Miquel Vives
title_short: (07559) Son Servera - 80 Passeig Pintor Miquel Vives
description: Parking for mobile homes and vans in the immediate vicinity of the beach, perfectly signposted. It has services on the seafront, among the pines. Unfortunately, the place has expired, no more services.

title: (07560) Cala Millor - 53 Camí de son Moro
title_short: (07560) Cala Millor - 53 Camí de son Moro
description: Free big dirt parking lot, lot's places to park, however little shade. Quite even though near a street.

title: (07559) Son Servera - 3 Avinguda del Pinar
description: Motorhomes are undesirable here, it is better to park on the official site 600 meters away and then come here to swim and shower.

title: (07560) Sant Llorenç des Cardassar - 5 Carrer Tamarell
title_short: (07560) Sant Llorenç des Cardassar - 5 Carrer Tamarell
description: Parking nou, asfaltat, anivellat i sense soroll. No hi ha cap prohibition

title: (07559) Son Servera - 12 Carrer dels Brucs

title: (07560) Sa Coma - 9 Avinguda de ses Palmeres
title_short: (07560) Sa Coma - 9 Avinguda de ses Palmeres
description: Public parking, beautiful area a few meters from the beach, restaurants and bars, carrefour and markets. Children's park, excursions, beautiful hiking and biking trails. We spent the night with other motorhomes.

title: (07559) Son Servera - 10 Carrer de l'Ermita
description: Very quiet corner in the woods near the golf course.

title: (07550) Costa dels Pins - Ma-4040
description: Parking by the road. Noisy from passing cars, but pleasant, because it is shaded and airy. We stayed there for a baby nap. There were no prohibition signs, so you can probably spend the night here (it's probably quieter). We travel by motorhome (7m).

title: (07560) Sant Llorenç des Cardassar - 10 Carrer Riuet
title_short: (07560) Sant Llorenç des Cardassar - 10 Carrer Riuet
description: Very large and spacious public parking near the beach, with bike lanes, restaurants, shops, etc... It has no services, only containers, to collect garbage.

title: (07530) - 970 Diseminado Poligono 4
description: Very quiet place, close to the town, it is very large, it passes a green road of 29 km, it is almost at km20.Ideal for walking or cycling.The road passes through four villages.For the moment without services

title: (07559) Son Servera - 110 Carrer Sense Nom
description: Slightly sloping parking lot on the side of the road just before a turning point and vantage point with a view of the sea on a cliff.

title: (07589) Capdepera - 159 Via Costa i Llobera
description: Very good spot at the end of the road. Very pleasant view of the coast in the evening as when waking up. Very calm, no passage. A hiking trail seems to be right next to it. We were the only van but a second can enter.

title: (07680) Porto Cristo - 1454 Poligono Poligon 10
description: Camper parking space for adults only in the huge beautiful outdoor area of ​​the Agrotourismo Hotel "Ollymar" above Porto Cristo.  The system is ideal for tolerant, cosmopolitan people aged 18 and over.  Restaurant, breakfast service, sanitary facilities, pool, whirlpool, sun loungers, WiFi, etc.Credit card payment not possible.

title: (07589) Capdepera - 109 Via de les Cales
description: Unobstructed view, 500m above sea level at "via de les calles". One night there without problem, very quiet.

title: (07570) Artà - 19 Carrer dels Blanquers
description: Ample parking in town.

title: (07570) Artà - 79 Carrer de Ciutat
description: Repsol with free water to fill up the camper tank.

title: (07570) Artà - 25 Avinguda dels Pujols
description: Free parking left and right of the roundabout. Ideal to visit Arta. I have not stayed here. But I think it will be quiet at night. Also very suitable for larger mobile.

title: (07690) Cala Llombards - 21 Carrer Passeig de la Mar

title: (07570) Artà - 205 Diseminado Poligon 24

title: (07570) Artà - 228 Carrer del Cos

title: (07589) Capdepera - 124 Calle a D-d
description: Quite place in the evening, next to beautiful bay with nice beach.

title: (07570) Artà - 16 Diseminado Can Pamboli
description: You can fill up with water for free. But not that fast.

title: (07680) Porto Cristo - 25 Ronda de l'Oest
description: Water filling, vacuum cleaner, van washing and cheap gasoline!

title: (07570) Artà - 16 Diseminado Can Pamboli
description: Free parking within walking distance of the pretty little town of Arta. view of the upper town. plenty of places out of season.

title: (07570) Artà -
description: Parking in the city of Arta, at the foot of the sanctuary. Many places, we spent the night at the end of the parking with a view of the sanctuary, ready for the city tour the next day. Numerous passage of the police in the evening that we never said anything. We even unpacked table and chairs to eat at night, while storing absolutely everything for the night. We are in the middle of October, so out of season. Market in the city on Tuesday. The place is certainly not sublime, but it allows you to sleep safely to visit the city.

title: (07680) Manacor - 19 Carrer de la Punta Rasa
title_short: (07680) Manacor - 19 Carrer de la Punta Rasa
description: Roadside parking in a quiet area. houses on one side with a picnic area leading to sea cliffs on the other. very quiet, a few minutes walking distance from the town/ beach

title: (07589) Capdepera - 48 Carretera Coves de s'Ermita
description: Parking in the Arta cave with magnificent view. We spent a lovely evening and a restful night there.

title: (07680) Porto Cristo - 1 Carrer Galeo
description: It is a street by the sea, with breeze and sea views, very very quiet, sleeping is great, it is not a car park as such but it sleeps without problems. It is a residential area with very little vehicle traffic. To sleep one or two nights great. The sea is oiled all night.

title: (07680) Manacor - 2 Carrer de les Salines
description: Between two houses in a residential area. Quiet and safe to park and spend a night. View of the sea and the moon :-) 10 minutes walk from the city center and the beach.

title: (07680) Manacor - 3 Carretera del Moll
description: Parking only

title: (07680) Manacor - 2 Carrer del Morenell
description: Free public parking. Little flat. Near the center and restaurant area at the foot of the port.

title: (07680) Manacor - 29 Carrer de la Vela
description: May: Dead end at the end of the cliff just in front of the last houses. We did just go there, but it's worth it to try the night;) By cons in high season I will not pronounce ...

title: (07680) Porto Cristo - 6 Carrer del Gambí
description: Fairly wide street, very close to the caves and 10 min walk from the shops. very pleasant area compared to the surrounding car parks.

title: (07680) Porto Cristo -
description: Parking Coves del Drac. Visit caves. Ample parking with shade. Picnic area. It closes at 6pm.

title: (07680) Manacor - 2 Plaça Torre
description: At the end of a dead end street, a small spot to spend the night, with a viewpoint. Relatively quiet place, with a few passages of walkers coming to admire the view.

title: (07589) Provensals - 24 Carrer s'Arbossar
description: Very pleasant, calm and shady place. Near the sea.

title: (07680) Manacor - 23 Carrer Bitàcola
description: Small parking lot next to a holiday home, nice view!

title: (07680) Manacor - 20 Carrer de la Brúixola
description: Access parking to Cala Muerta. no prohibition signs. I think it is even possible to spend the night but it is very sloping. We just used this parking lot to go see the Cala.

title: (07589) Provensals - 189 Carrer Vell Marí
description: It really is not a parking lot, but the cars park there to go fishing or to swim in the large area of rocks that there is. The rocks are at the height of the water so that access to water is easy.

title: (07589) Provensals - Carretera de Sa Font de Sa Gala
title_short: (07589) Provensals - Carretera de Sa Font de Sa Gala
description: Beautiful seaside resort near Cala Ratjada and Capdepera. It is a car park that is of course heavily frequented in the high season. But we always found a place. Some hotels in the area, but also cafes and restaurants, also on the beach. Beach shower available, was enough for us. Good opportunities for hiking. No camping, please, and don't leave rubbish lying around!

address.street: Carretera de Sa Font de Sa Gala

title: (07500) Manacor - 147 Poligono Poligon 30
description: Petroest gas station, resposting there you have water, emptying of gray and black water.

title: (07580) Capdepera - 10 Carrer de sa Tafona Nova
title_short: (07580) Capdepera - 10 Carrer de sa Tafona Nova
description: Partially shaded parking, suitable for CC over 7m. Playground for children nearby. Night possible, no prohibition. Very quiet and close to the city center and the castle.

title: (07570) Artà - Ma-3333
description: Small square between Torente and street; quiet, little traffic (also suitable for a night (max. Van < 5m).

title: (07580) Capdepera - 18 Carrer de sa Lluna
description: Free cement parking with fairly large spaces for vans.

title: (07580) Capdepera - 16b Plaça de la Constitució
description: Free parking, perfect for visiting the city and the castle. There was room even in the middle of the afternoon. We didn't spend the night here but it seems possible. No amenities on the parking lot.

title: (07590) Es Carregador - 132 Avinguda dels Pins
description: Place to sleep with stunning views. possibility of getting up and swimming in crystal clear waters.

title: (07680) Porto Cristo Novo - 248 Passeig Infanta Carlota
title_short: (07680) Porto Cristo Novo - 248 Passeig Infanta Carlota
description: Place near the Anguila cove, restaurant and beach bar

title: (07680) Manacor - 1137 Carrer Marco Polo
description: Large car park near the beaches. Very calm. No height limitation. Ideal for a night

title: (07680) Manacor - 1115 Passeig Alfonso XII
description: Parking in the creek, a little uneven. If you park in front of the chain, make it aside (in the morning, at 6 o'clock, the tractor goes to the beach). We slept with the rooftop safely and another van. There is a bar on the beach and showers ... The one closest to the beach gets better. In the day a lots of cars.

title: (07580) Capdepera - 132 Carrer de la Mar
description: Parking lot behind the sports halls, slightly sloping

title: (07680) Cala Anguila-Cala Mendia - 95 Carrer de son Moro
title_short: (07680) Cala Anguila-Cala Mendia - 95 Carrer de son Moro
description: Parking on the beach, surrounded by nature, there are no signs forbidden motorhomes.

title: (07589) Son Moll - 68 Avinguda Juan Carlos I
title_short: (07589) Son Moll - 68 Avinguda Juan Carlos I
description: Gas station Galp if you spend at the gas station washing ... they let you fill the water tank, the washing works very well

title: (07680) Cala Anguila-Cala Mendia - 61 Passeig Estany d'en Mas
title_short: (07680) Cala Anguila-Cala Mendia - 61 Passeig Estany d'en Mas
description: Parking next to the playa Romantica

title: (07590) Son Moll - 6 Ma-15
description: At the Respol Station you have water. Good flow.

title: (07589) Son Moll - 5 Avenida Mediterrani
description: Parking in a pine forest lit at night, it's flat and there are bins, with plenty of space in winter.

title: (07579) Artà - Carretera Camide Cala Mitjana
description: Parking of a viewpoint on the access road to Cala Torta and Cala Mitjana. Quiet place, and although it is next to the road, very few cars pass during night. Surrounded by pine forests and incredible views. Access suitable for large ACs too. Pretty flat.

title: (07590) Cala Ratjada - 2 Via Mallorca
description: A&G Services Wax Salon Lavanderia. Attention there are only two possible washes and you cannot reduce the spin, always 1200! 40 or 60 degrees. Even the cold laundry came out very hot. The other wash cycles that can be selected are optically covered, but can be accidentally selected. Then the machine stops in the middle of the washing process. Small sink for washing hands or pre-washing laundry. WiFi available. Detergent available. GOOD TO KNOW: The dryer can be opened in the middle of the drying process - then the drying time can be increased in small steps. Otherwise you start again with a long sequence. staff friendly.

title: (07579) Artà - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place and separated from civilization. The road is very narrow. With a motorhome, it would not go up, but for vans, it's perfect. Without service

title: (07590) - 1010 Diseminado Galdi
description: We have found this place that is inside a pine forest, next to a path that leads to some houses. It is a quiet and hidden place to spend the night.

title: (07500) Manacor - 20 Carrer de Sant Llorenç d'es Cardassar
title_short: (07500) Manacor - 20 Carrer de Sant Llorenç d'es Cardassar
description: Super nice lady in the laundromat. She turned on the machine for us & then put everything in the dryer. After 2 hours everything was ready, in the meantime we went to the old town.

address.street: 20 Carrer de Sant Llorenç d'es Cardassar

title: (07590) Cala Agulla - 40 Carrer l'Esperança
description: Dead end street in front of a wooded area with direct trails to Cala Agulla. We have left the van all day in this place and we have slept without noise.

title: (07590) - 1016T Diseminado Cala Agulla
description: Cala Agulla car park. In this car park you have to pay. cars 5 euros and motorhomes and vans 12 euros if you spend the night included. They no longer have toilets or showers. We have been talking to the girl who makes the payments and she tells us that a little over a year ago it was a campsite but today it is no longer. therefore, it only works as a car park to go down to the beach. you can spend the night but you cannot camp.

title: (07500) Manacor - 87 Via Palma
description: Repsol petrol station with possibility to fill water but costs.

title: (07590) Cala Agulla - 123 Avinguda Cala Agulla
description: Dead end street next to the hotel and a wooded area on the other side, which provides shade for a long time. Low light, perfect for sleeping. On the same street lower down with sea views but more uneven. Some movement around the hotel. Access to Agulla cove 200m away, where there are showers. Supermarkets and restaurants nearby.

title: (07680) Cala Romantica - Unnamed road
description: Parking, close to the road (to be seen, but a lot of traffic at night surely because of the main road), accessible, beach not very far on foot, not too much shade

title: (07500) Manacor - 65 Poligono Poligon 28
description: Area to spend the night near the road, area with trees with stone benches.

title: (07590) Cala Agulla - 164A Diseminado Cala Agulla
description: Street with a view for Cala Agulla

title: (07500) Manacor - 1 Plaça de Ramon Llull
description: Public car park in the immediate vicinity of the city center.

title: (07590) Capdepera - 5 Carrer d'Elionor Servera
description: Parking at the edge of the forest Near Cala Gat and within walking distance to Cala Ratjada. Stood here a few nights with no problems from the hotel. Beautiful hiking trails lead to the lighthouse and the coast. Difficult to find a straight seat. But pretty shady

title: (07500) Manacor - 1901 Poligono Poligon 29
description: Ample free parking next to the sports center. It has many parking spaces but only at the end is it flatter. Ideal for night, quiet and without noise. It is next to the Rafa Nadal museum. There is no type of service, just a couple of containers.

title: (07590) Cala Lliteres - 13 Carrer de na Lliteres
title_short: (07590) Cala Lliteres - 13 Carrer de na Lliteres
description: The car park is located opposite a bar / cafe and is located on the seafront. The parking is free. In the bar / café you can from 9 clock in the morning very good breakfast and the toilets. The center is within walking distance in 15 minutes! In the early morning, the garbage collection passes once, which is a bit disturbing. Otherwise all top for one night, if you want to visit the nightlife of Cala Ratjada or the beautiful nearby beach.

title: (07590) Capdepera - Carrer d´Atunes
description: Initially the idea was to dine and enjoy the sunset at the foot of the lighthouse with a magnificent panorama. Then 2 other vans arrived which made us decide to stay for the night. Access by narrow road. Roadside parking. Stony and windy. Quiet but on the way for the view. It's not the "ideal" place to sleep, that's for sure, but helps out well and breathtaking view of the bay of Capdepera.

title: (07500) Manacor - 45 Via Palma
description: Repsol gas station with water filling service. With containers.

title: (07500) Manacor - 5 A-24
description: Place to fill up with drinking water, it does not have a hose connection, it is a tap and there is a schedule to fill up as seen in the photo, only water there nothing else, good access

title: (07590) Cala Lliteres - 59 Carrer de l'Olla
description: Flat ground parking for access to Cala Olla, in the area of Cala Rajada. After the climb, leaving a forest area on the right. You can go down carefully to the cove (difficult on foot), and you can also take the trails in that area to Punta de Capdepera. There are houses relatively close, but due to the covid we believe that the tourist ones were closed, we spent a quiet night.

title: (07579) Artà - Carretera Camide Cala Mitjana
description: Parking at the access roads to Cala Torta, Cala Mitjada and Cala Estrella. Is also suitable for large motorhomes that do not create the (more beautiful, directly on the sea) neighboring places. It is nice and straight at the pine forest. Was not disturbed ...

title: (07589) Cala Mesquida - 1 Carrer des Rap
description: Quiet place sheltered from the excitement of the city under the trees. It is far from being an idyllic place but very practical to spend a night! In addition, you will be 5 minutes walk from the beach which is just splendid!

title: (07570) Artà - Ma-12
description: Gas station with free air and water, you can refill the tanks without problem

title: (07579) Colonia de Sant Pere - 4 Carrer Ca'n Metxo
title_short: (07579) Colonia de Sant Pere - 4 Carrer Ca'n Metxo
description: Very quiet urban parking next to a pharmacy. I doubt that with here you can enter since the entrance is a bit narrow. With a gv I entered without problems. place to sleep very very quiet (better than the other 2 car parks).

title: (07579) Cala Mesquida -
description: Nice spot, small location slightly set back from the road very little used because in poor condition. The road goes around to the beach but is impassable a few hundred meters further with a van. Nice view, only one place relatively flat, in the middle of the vegetation.

title: (07579) Colonia de Sant Pere - 65 Polígon de la Mar
title_short: (07579) Colonia de Sant Pere - 65 Polígon de la Mar
description: Parking next to the port with sea views, the places are not very large. Very quiet at the time we have been, we have slept very well although there are bars around and it may not be recommended in high season.

title: (07579) Betlem - 134 Avinguda Llorer
description: We slept here after the police invited us to go to the park4nights near the sea. It is a fairly large field, next to a road that leads to an urbanization, quiet at night. From here, a path goes up to the Betlem viewpoint (50 ') with beautiful views (one of the photos is from the viewpoint).

title: (07579) Betlem - 10T Polígon Ferrutx
description: After a climb of about a hundred meters on a sloping track, a nice flat place with a magnificent view.

title: (07579) Urbanització s'Estanyol - 53 Carrer des Pla de Mar
title_short: (07579) Urbanització s'Estanyol - 53 Carrer des Pla de Mar
description: Peaceful parking in a dead end. 2 nights very calm. Small beach and windsurfing spot 200 m

title: (07579) Artà - Carretera Camide Cala Mitjana
description: Cala Torta Parking in the pine forest before the beach. They told us in the tourist office of Arta, that the city council intended to restrict access to motorhomes from 2019. During the day, it's partytime, at night, it's is super quiet. The last section is a track.

title: (07589) Cala Mesquida - 2 Calle A-c C Mesquida
title_short: (07589) Cala Mesquida - 2 Calle A-c C Mesquida
description: Perfect place to visit the Mesquida cove, plenty of shade during the day and afternoon, outings on trails for excursions.

title: (07579) Urbanització s'Estanyol -
description: Small path in peace, no car passage. Between trees and facing the sea. The entrance is open, you have to pass the abandoned villa and a large green space is free. 2 converted vans slept there.

title: (07579) Artà - Unnamed Road
description: Dead end road. Possibility to park but as often to stay the night it is not explicit. Impressive calm in high season. Fabulous panorama. In a Van and for one night, it's perfect

title: (07500) Manacor - 17 Via Palma
description: Possibility to fill up with water (not drinkable)

title: (07579) Artà - 3 Diseminado Camping Club
description: In front of a former campsite, you stand quietly on a very little-used road; only now and then people who walk their dog or go for a walk.

title: (07589) Cala Mesquida - 57 Avenida Marian-c.msq
description: Parking open 24 hours, in summer it is quite full, but we went in November and there was no one, summer tourist area. Departure from point of excursions and to walk, very quiet place both day and night.

title: (07589) Cala Mesquida - 74C Via Silvana
description: Very wide quiet street with easy access into and out of Cala mezquina

title: (07579) Cala Mesquida - Unnamed Road
description: Abandoned Bay. Near Cala Ratjada. Fantastically beautiful, you can definitely spend your night here undisturbed by the sea!

title: (07589) Capdepera - 999 Calle Esperrall
description: Dead end street that widens at the end to allow turning. We spent the night when the tourist season was over and super quiet. Views of the entire beach of Cala Mesquida. Possibly in summer there is noise and you can not park. Out of season I recommend it. Nearby there are garbage and services.

title: (07579) Betlem - 72 Polígon Artà
description: Parking at the end of a dead-end street. We spent one night here after checking that it was not possible to park in the rest of 4nights in front of the sea. Quiet and flat place, without services.

title: (07579) Artà - Carretera Camide Cala Mitjana
description: BEAUTIFUL CREE!!! Crystal clear waters, accessible only by 4x4, or by motorhome with a certain height and skill behind the wheel. Take care of the environment!

title: (07500) Manacor - 314 Poligono Poligon 34
description: A little place to spend the night. Some rubbish litter the ground and the few piles of rubble do not dream but the place is quiet to spend one or two nights of passage. The spot is located in the heights of Manacor. No services.

title: (07509) Manacor - 85 Poligono Poligon 33
description: Siding with space for two vans. The way up is VERY stony and I do not recommend for motorhomes. It is right next to a house but you can't see anything. I don't think you can spend the night, but it has shade and we have eaten and rested. I would give it 2 stars.

title: (07500) Manacor - 42 Carrer Fusters
description: Ample public parking close to the city

title: (07459) Son Serra de Marina - 1 Carrer Sant Lluís
title_short: (07459) Son Serra de Marina - 1 Carrer Sant Lluís
description: Parking without limitations of schedules or dates, close to a beautiful beach and natural areas like little on the island. No service, residential area with the exception of a restaurant and a shop nearby. For vehicles under 5.20m

title: (07459) Son Serra de Marina - 1A Calle Llarg
title_short: (07459) Son Serra de Marina - 1A Calle Llarg
description: Space enabled by the town hall. Without emptying or filling services. It is a little inclined. Behind is a pine forest and the beach is at the end, down the street.

title: (07459) Son Serra de Marina - 2 Carrer de l'Ancora
title_short: (07459) Son Serra de Marina - 2 Carrer de l'Ancora
description: Dead end street with a forest next to it that gives shade to the east, so it covers you in the morning and a colorful park next to it

title: (07459) Son Serra de Marina - 2 Carrer Roselles
title_short: (07459) Son Serra de Marina - 2 Carrer Roselles
description: Es gibt viele kleine Straßen direkt in Strandnähe, auf denen man kostenfrei parken kann. Wir haben hier eine Nacht direkt am Strand verbracht und sind morgens mit Meerblick aufgewacht. Direkt nebenan gibt es eine Beachbar und ein Café mit kleinen Supermarkt.

title: (07500) Manacor - 1068 Diseminado Poligon 26
description: Propane and butane cylinders available, closed on Sundays

title: (07689) Manacor - Carrer de Cala Antena
description: Beautiful place surrounded by nature, near nice bay (and hotels across the bay). Close to Cala Bota climbing. Exposed to wind. Good cell connection.

title: (07689) Cales de Mallorca - 215 Carrer Cala Antena
title_short: (07689) Cales de Mallorca - 215 Carrer Cala Antena
description: Esplanade on the beach, a little complicated way. there are showers on the plagr y toilet of the hut (ask for the key)

name: Campament Hipocampo
title: (07689) Campament Hipocampo
description:
Campanento Hippocampo: Very nice oasis in middle of nothing.
It’s possible to park a van and refresh yourself with showers, pool and clean toilet. Just what we need for another part of our “wild camping” trip in Mallorca. Peoples here are very nice. Can be crowded but with tents Od peoples in rented rooms, but nights are calm.

title: (07688) Cales de Mallorca - 145 Carrer de Cala Domingos
title_short: (07688) Cales de Mallorca - 145 Carrer de Cala Domingos
description: Next to the beach and centre, one row of parked cars and some shade with trees. Ideal for cars and vans. Possible motor homes. Free parking and some, but little traffic just people walking to the beach. Good spot

title: (07689) Cales de Mallorca - 173 Carrer de Cala Domingos
title_short: (07689) Cales de Mallorca - 173 Carrer de Cala Domingos
description: Spectacular place, one of the best and beautiful beaches, it has clean public bathrooms open from 10:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. and showering for a fee in the beach bar that is very good and the waiters are wonderful, it has picnic tables . When it is high season maybe a little noise but the area is very quiet

title: (07688) Manacor - 152 Carrer Sense Nom
description: Parking in the shade next to Cala Domingos. flat area with space for several motorhomes. super night

title: (07459) Santa Margalida - 158 Diseminado Son Real
description: Parking of the house are real, very quiet. during the day it has toilets in the house. from there there is a very nice path to go to the beach.

title: (07688) Cala Murada - Carrer Galícia
description: Parking in Cala Murada with public toilets until 4pm and showers in the cove bar, there are kayaks and paddle surf boards... there are no prohibition signs, there are buggy and quad excursions in the morning

title: (07520) Balearic Islands - 6013 Diseminado Sector Num 1
description: Drinking water at Repsol gas station

title: (07670) Illes Balears -
description: Water to fill a tank

title: (07670) Felanitx - Camí de S'Algar
description: It is a beautiful place to spend the day, there are hiking trails.

title: (07458) Can Picafort - 41 Carretera Artà-Alcúdia
description: Campervan wash with no height limit.

title: (07670) Felanitx - 11 Carretera Far Pc
description: Generous free parking, right on the shore with swimming possibility. Dustbin available. Until 19:00 a busy street but had a quiet night. Is visited by many campers!

title: (07520) Petra - Camí de Son Torrat
description: Quiet place near road (almost no cars at night), flat, with easy access. You can park your vehicle, sit on brick wall and enjoy nice view.

title: (07670) Felanitx - 42 Carrer Ciutat de Seta
description: Nice free parking with a beautiful view of the sea. We have visited this spot many time when holidaying in Portacolom, it's a great Campervan stopover, no passing traffic and no nearby houses. From time to time a few tourists and joggers. No infrastructure. For motorhomes up to 6m suitable.

title: (07670) Portocolom - 60 Carretera Felanitx Puerto C
description: economical laundry

title: (07200) Felanitx - PMV-4011
description: Small parking lot on the road to the San Salvador Monastery. Relatively flat. Great view, quiet. Road up winding, not too steep, asphalt in very good condition. Please keep it clean! Sleeps 3-4 at night.

title: (07670) Felanitx - 12-110 Carrer del Tancat de sa Torre
title_short: (07670) Felanitx - 12-110 Carrer del Tancat de sa Torre
description: Very calm at Easter and in winter

address.street: 12-110 Carrer del Tancat de sa Torre

title: (07250) Vilafranca de Bonany - Unnamed Road
description: The Bonany Monastery car park offers a gravel parking space under trees for one to a maximum of two vans and many vacant straight asphalt parking spaces. It is very clean and there are some garbage cans. Here you are outside the monastery walls, which we much preferred to driving directly into a private area. There would also be parking spaces right next to a picnic area and the toilets. Especially since the monastery is inhabited and also offers rentals, it was not right for us to spend the night higher up directly under strange windows. The toilets are on the monastery grounds, 2-3 minutes from the lower parking lot.

title: (07520) Petra - Unnamed Road
description: Buen sitio para aparcar y pernoctar, situado justo al lado de la ermita de Bonany. Hay mesas de picnic y un pozo de agua potable (cerrado ahora por COVID). Magníficas vistas

title: (07208) Felanich - PMV-4011
description: Day parking, picnic areas, no camping at the monastery

title: (07670) Portocolom - 31B Carretera Far Pc
description: Toilets belong to the beach bar and are very clean! There are also beach showers on the beach, one of which has a seat for the disabled.

title: (07670) Felanitx - 27 Carrer del Far
description: Great location next to a restaurant by the sea. Quiet area with very little passage at night (early July) and a wonderful view at breakfast!

title: (07200) Palma - 1881 Diseminado Primera Volta
description: Gas station. Good way to fill up with water. Long hose and a lot of pressure. Self-service washing system with options to dispose of gray water. Nice personel!

title: (07458) Can Picafort - 99 Carrer Mar
description: BP gas station with free water service. Little flow, patience!

title: (07458) Can Picafort - 92 Carretera Artà-Alcúdia
description: In contrast to the vast majority of Repsol gas stations on the island, there are not only butane gas bottles here, but also propane gas bottles (as of 11/22).

title: (07670) Portocolom - 1 Carrer del Vapor Santueri
description: Inside the Eroski supermarket there are bathrooms, always clean, everything correct!

title: (07200) Felanitx - Km12,14 Carretera Porreres
description: BP gas station. We asked a very nice worker and we were able to fill the tank with water.

title: (07458) Can Picafort - 13 Carrer Josep Maria Llompart
title_short: (07458) Can Picafort - 13 Carrer Josep Maria Llompart
description:
Large municipal library parking lot.
 There is also ample parking for large motorhomes.

title: (07458) Can Picafort - 2 C-5
description: Laundry, ample parking.

title: (07200) Felanitx - 2 Carrer de Santueri
description: Launderette. Laundry is really dry at the highest setting.

title: (07670) Felanitx - 17 Carrer de la Fotja
description: Small però next to Cala Brafi, does not have però services for a perfect night!

title: (07200) Felanitx - 1 Carrer de Sant Nicolau
description: The cheapest gas station in the area

title: (07208) Felanitx - 617 Diseminado Sexta Volta
description: Free night and day parking with unbeatable views.

title: (07208) Es Carritxo - Unnamed Road
description: Last parking space before the hairpin bends!

title: (07200) Felanitx - 16 Carrer Quetgle
description: Quiet parking, next to a large park with sports machines and a small park for dogs. Lidl at 300m (recycles well). We have only spent one night and we have not found anyone parked or any noise.

title: (07458) Muro - Carrer Arenes
description: Parking suitable for small vans. Not suitable for AC in high season, since many cars come and it is difficult to manoeuvre. 50 meters from fantastic beach and walks.

title: (07458) Muro - Carrer Joglars
description: Dead end street, with picnic area, very close to the beach, on the right side of the street we park several motorhomes

title: (07458) Muro - 763 Carrer Platja
description: A truly splendid spot by the sea! It is a small car park in a circle that can accommodate several vans / motorhomes.

title: (07240) Sant Joan - Polígon Joan Mas i Mates
title_short: (07240) Sant Joan - Polígon Joan Mas i Mates
description: Municipal parking and the Hermitage of Consolation

title: (07669) Santanyí - 427 Diseminado Poligono 9
description: Small water tap in the parking lot of a building materials store. Good pressure but normal flow, like a tap at home. When we came it was a holiday and the parking lot was empty. There is some shade and it is level.

title: (07669) Cala Serena - 1 Calle Morras Cs
description: At the end of a street where there is a private urbanization with its own access. Street somewhat uneven, with rubbish It was a quiet night. Supermarkets and cafes nearby. Beach at 500m. In the surrounding streets or in the entire area of Cala d'Or there are multiple options where to park and spend the night.

title: (07669) Felanitx - 2 Carrer s'Hortet
description: Marked parking for 6. Ideal for campervans, motorhome possible out of season. Beach immediately in front of parking. Going to be busy in season but very quiet winter and spring.

title: (07458) Muro -
description: Albufera car park. It is usually crowded and noisy from cars. there are trees so some sites are not suitable for tall motorhomes.

title: (07440) Muro - 999F Carrer Poliesportiu
description: Sports car park in the municipality of Muro. It is in a quiet place. It can be placed at the bottom of the car park for added peace of mind. It has a charging point for electric vehicles. Perfect to spend a quiet night and take the opportunity to visit Muro. Parking is quite large.

title: (07660) Cala D'or - 66 Avinguda dels Benvinguts
description:
Water available very slowly but there is!
restrooms and convenience stores.

It's a 24 hour gas station parking lot. There's not much light or much movement and that's great. There are toilets inside the gas station, which is not if it can be done at night.

title: (07660) Santanyí - 38 Avinguda dels Benvinguts
description: A free water point from a Cepsa gas station. The water comes out with very little flow, in fact it is the faucet with the least flow that I have seen, but there is nothing else in the area.

title: (07230) - 1023 Diseminado Sector Num 2
description: Son Castanyer between Algaida and Vilafranca On the highway to Manacor, exit Son Bages no. 32, access via service path, then paved dirt road in a parking bay, 10 m in length, in front of an abandoned agricultural building, perfectly flat. with beautiful views of the area, our dogs enjoyed it. Suitable for a picnic and also for one night.

title: (07458) Illes Balears -
description: In the middle of the main street. 2 * beach line. Enough places to park. flat. surrounded by shops and bars. gratuitous. you can sleep well, despite the fact that tonight (weekend) there was traffic, movement and noise. The presence of a lot of mosquitoes is surprising. bring repellent.

title: (07510) - 149 Diseminado Son Nadal
description: Hermitage with a place to cover you from the rain, a porch, picnic tables, closed toilets and views and tranquility, olive trees and pine trees

title: (07660) Santanyí - 22 Carrer Mallorca
description: It is a change of address or roundabout with practicable parking on its banks, people use it to park and go fishing and things like that. Good place to sleep, very very quiet ideal if you come by motorhome and something big since you can't find a place in town. We slept here for two very hot days and I guarantee that with the little breeze from the sea we slept fabulously. We only changed on the third day to the other place that I put here very close due to the proximity to a beach and cove to which it is impossible to park as the sheets stick to you in this place. The other site you commented on is not for motorhomes. Okay? We go with a Ducato.

title: (07660) Cala D'or - 1D Carrer Marquès de Comillas
title_short: (07660) Cala D'or - 1D Carrer Marquès de Comillas
description: Free public toilets and beach showers

title: (07660) Santanyí - 39 Avinguda de Calonge
description: Free parking super well located.. In the heart of the village, all at a step supermarket next bars etc. Beach a pleasant 5 min walk. Recommendable

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 93A Camí d'Alcanada
description: Parking on the beach, but it has sign infront: max 5m lenght and 2.1m height

title: (07660) Cala D'or - 5 Calle sin Nombre 272
description: Perfect place to visit Cala d'Or. suitable for larger motorhomes. 7m with the back over the sidewalk

title: (07660) Santanyí - 26 Carrer Menorca
description: Parking right by the sea, no service. Since few tourists on the island, very quiet area. Good for one night.

title: (07660) Santanyí - 14 Carrer de s'Estel
description: This is a street that is a p .. a marvel, central street chiringuitos, restaurants, playgrounds with attractions, shows .... And strategic enough that as it is a street if no one goes out. In the shade ... And next to some hedges that at night put the automatic irrigation and the truth that refreshes jjjjjj. This site is not suitable for motorhomes as such, I say it for the width that although they fit well ... It seems too much for this site. We move in a ducato camper of 6 meters plus a ball carrier of 0.8m. But the length is not the problem, we go with Ducato standard width. Okay?

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 93A Camí d'Alcanada
description: Roadside parking. Direct view of the beach / sea.

title: (07660) Santanyí - 31 Avinguda de Calonge
description: Lavandería Punt D'aigua Express - Laundromat with multiple washers and dryers. Must be paid with coins! Detergent is already present and smells good.  My laundry (bedding, clothes, etc.) was dry in 20 minutes. There are parking spaces either directly on the street or behind the building. Driveway also suitable for larger mobile homes. Wasn't sure if the coin changer worked because there was a note on it. That's why I changed money in the supermarket beforehand.

title: (07510) Sineu - 6 Carrer del Carril
description: Public parking, ideal for visiting the town of "Sineu", a few meters from the center and all its activity. The train passes right next to it, but it does not bother, We enjoyed its night market and had a great night. Lovely town. . The parking area does not have services

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 77 Camí d'Alcanada
description: Very quiet and with shadows, further down is the lighthouse parking lot but here it is shady with hammocks, banks

title: (07691) S'Alqueria Blanca -
description: Water point in the cemetery to fill bottles or cans. Plenty of room to park, and some shade

title: (07510) Sineu - 3 Carrer Doctor Rafel Rotger i Mestre
title_short: (07510) Sineu - 3 Carrer Doctor Rafel Rotger i Mestre
description: Parking at a small park on the outskirts of the village. Perfect to spend the night before/after a tour of the village, there are great restaurants & a small brewery there. We stayed there for 2 nights and had no problems whatsoever.

address.street: 3 Carrer Doctor Rafel Rotger i Mestre

title: (07660) Santanyí - 29 Carrer des Comellars
description: Very large parking without problems away from beach areas a little traffic at night very quiet

title: (07510) Sineu - 41A Carrer Nou
description: Parking on the outskirts

title: (07400) Cielo de Bonaire - Unnamed Road
description: Small parking lot flatter than the one above. 15min from the refuge. Forbidden to camp in all the area. We are in a nasturtium motorhome 2.90m high and 5.90 long and we had no problems with the road.

title: (07660) Santanyí - 61 Avinguda d'es Fortí
description: Large parking at Es Forti. Slightly inclined ground. The top sites are quite flat. Of course, there is public traffic during the day. Not far from the tourist center. No disposal and water supply services, etc. Also suitable for slightly larger campers.

title: (07458) Muro - 133 Carrer Creuer
description: Repsol with free non potable water, just ask politely.

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 6 Carrer dels Àlbers
description: One night parking facing the sea to be close to the port to embark the next morning. Places available out of season.

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 45 Carrer Poblat Butà
description: Parking next to Balearia. Good in case you arrive at 4 from Barcelona by boat.

title: (07510) Sineu - 1241 Diseminado Diseminados Var
description: Parking lot at school

title: (07400) Alcúdia - Unnamed Road
description: Several gravel places, surrounded by nature. At the end of the "road" begins the trail to "Coll Baix". "Road" and parking NOT suitable for campers !!

title: (07660) Cala D'or - 3 Carrer de Voltor
description: Ample parking, with playground and public park to rest.

title: (07660) Cala D'or - 13 Carrer d'es Galió
description: Public parking in very quiet tennis school, small pine forest

title: (07400) Alcúdia - Carrer del Moll Comercial
description:
Small car park to wait for your boat for Menorca or Barcelona.
Very simple but practical.

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 5 Carrer dels Xiprers
description: Very little trafficked street to spend the night in peace. Views of the s'Albufera lake. Across the street is Playa del Muro. Bars, gas station and Eroski very close.

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 8 Carrer Can Vauma
description: Narrow headland in a saltwater river. Plenty of parking space because lots of flat space and trees create privacy. Unfortunately some rubble in the surrounding bushes. A few walkers on the way in the morning.

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 3 Carrer de la Ginesta
description: We came across this place because we walked here from another place. There is a beach bar at the end of a street called Sarita Beach. In front of it there are 5-6 parking spaces that have also been used by large campers. You stand in the shade of the pine trees and you are right on the beach. There are 3 dixi toilets and a beach bar. The beach is very clean and there are garbage cans everywhere. A dream place to go swimming during the day.

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 9 Carrer de l'Espalmador
description: Nice flat parking lot. Calm. Alarm clock with roosters. 5 'walk from the port.

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 8 Carrer de les Acàcies
description: Fantastic place next to the lake of S'Albufera, Alcudia.

title: (07400) Alcúdia - 6 Carrer de Ciutadella
description: Free public parking. There is no sign of forbidden AC or forbidden to stay overnight. We have spent the night. Very calm .

title: (07691) Santanyí - 1 Carretera Porto Petro Alqueria
description:
Just set off the bend of Porto Petro a flat (ish) area for 2 motorhomes

just far enough away from the road to not have much noise but still close enough for the great view

PLEASE NOTE THIS IS A NATURAL RIVER BED. DO NOT PARK HERE IN A HEAVY STORM

title: (07650) Santanyí - 29 Carrer des Convent
description: Non-potable water to fill the tank free.

title: (07691) Santanyí - 39 Carrer Donants de Sang
description: It's a nice quiet parking place, also there are lots of parking places in this vicinity, there is a market and shopping mall nearby.
